channel.title: Dragon Claws Help
channel.description:
Hello, I was wondering if i could get some to fix my dragon claws?
Base: Delta Type: 317
For starters it only hits 2 times on npc's and the emote is horrible. It's also 2 fast
Here is a video of it, it hits 4 times on players and does the same thing on npc's but only hits 2 times.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o3DVH47aPOA
Thanks, please help.
